module1/ ├─ index.html ← Module 1 menu (entry) ├─ intro.html ← intro passage + optional video ├─ flashcards.html ← flashcards only ├─ matching.html ← matching game (medium version, refactored) ├─ quiz.html ← 5-question quiz page ├─ module1.css ← styles specific to module1 (overrides main style) └─ module1.js ← logic for flashcards / matching / quiz where needed
